name: Illuminati Quickscoper
description:
I made this game in 2016 and I have no idea why. It's a shitpost of some sort

How to play:

Left-click as many illuminati triangles as you can in 60 seconds. That's it.

I also uploaded this to the Scirra Arcade, here's the link:

https://www.scirra.com/arcade/shooting-games/illuminati-quickscoper-27721
